abstract: Police officers arrest two pilots on Air Transat plane set to depart from Glasgow for Toronto on suspicion of being under influence of alcohol; passengers express both anger and relief at flight's delay.
lead_paragraph: The flight to Toronto from Glasgow was delayed more than 20 hours, and passengers seemed to display relief as well as outrage.

headline.main: Air Transat Pilots Pulled From Jet and Arrested on Suspicion of Being Drunk
headline.print_headline: 2 Pilots in Glasgow Arrested on Alcohol Suspicion

snippet: The flight to Toronto from Glasgow was delayed more than 20 hours, and passengers seemed to display relief as well as outrage....
